com.davidmiguel.gobees.monitoring

Class MonitoringPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidmiguel.gobees.monitoring.MonitoringPresenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MonitoringContract.Presenter, BasePresenter, org.opencv.android.CameraBridgeViewBase.CvCameraViewListener2

    class MonitoringPresenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MonitoringContract.Presenter, org.opencv.android.CameraBridgeViewBase.CvCameraViewListener2
    Listens to user actions from the UI MonitoringFragment, retrieves the data and updates the UI as required.
